scripts.test: npm run test -ws # ⚠️ tichu-web will run tests in watch mode when not on CI
scripts.lint: npm run build -ws &&  npm run lint -w tichu-web # ⚠️ eslint not currently setup for other packages ⚠️pre-build as a workaround while we figure out module stuff (See #829)
scripts.web-build-storybook: npm run build -w tichu-client-ts-lib && npm run build-storybook -w tichu-web
scripts.prettier-check-all: prettier --check .. # not using --workspaces here so we also check the root
scripts.prettier-fix-all: prettier --write .. # not using --workspaces here so we also check the root
